text:
(1)
1476 Richmond Terrace, east side, between Norden Street and Delaware Street, showing the Perine House, home of the Staten Island Society. It is the oldest house on Staten Island. During the Revolution the house was the headquarters of Captain Coghlan.

1924

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view of the house, looking east.

1924

P. L. Sperr

(3)
An additional view at a later date.

June 5, 1930

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Norden Street
